project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the logic to find the top 10 most common words
Implement the display functionality to output the results to the terminal
Write tests for each of the above features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
